name: 妮娅姆·威尔逊 Niamh Wilson
intro: About Actress best known for her role as Corbett in Saw III and Saw IV. In 2016 she received a Young Artist Award for her supporting role in The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet. Before Fame She started acting in preschool and at the age of five, she starred in the television pilot Chasing Alice for the WB network. Trivia Her title role in Debra! won her a 2012 Young Artist Award in the Leading Actress in a TV Series category. Family Life She grew up with two older brothers near Toronto, Canada. Associated With She co-starred with Kim Raver, playing the role of Sarah in the 2005 horror film Haunting Sarah.
birthplace: 加拿大,安大略省,奥克维尔
